history.proof: unfold s_step_coh_t. unfold coh. unfold client_step. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
the_tag: nat
prec: nid -> seq nat -> Prop
prec_safe: forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}

Goal:
s_step_coh_t coh the_tag client_step

Premises:
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
client_step : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), client_send_safe this to d msg -> option heap
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
to : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- eqType]
msg_from_client = fun ms : TaggedMessage => tag ms == update_tag /\ (exists e v : nat, ms = [:: e; v]) \/ tag ms == read_tag /\ (exists e : nat, ms = [:: e]) : TaggedMessage -> Prop
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
nid = nat : Set
HClient = fun this to : nat_eqType => this \in clients /\ to == server : nat_eqType -> nat_eqType -> Prop
Notation seq := list
Notation coh := ResourceCoh
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- eqType] ?x : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid ->...-> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Equality.sort ?T]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type] ?pT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- predType ?T]

Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- cohpred ?nodes]

dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- ?A -> Type]
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- pcm]
rot : nat -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type]
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- pcm]
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- eqType]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- pcm]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type]
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- eqType]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type]
server_step_coh : forall (the_tag : nat) (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nat), HServ this to -> prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}) -> s_step_coh_t coh the_tag (server_step the_tag (prec:=prec))
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} |- Type]
server_send_trans : forall (the_tag : nat) (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nat), HServ this to -> prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}) -> Transitions.send_trans coh
server_send_update_response_trans_obligation_1 : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nat), HServ this to -> server_send_update_response_prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := update_response_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}
server_send_read_response_trans_obligation_1 : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nat), HServ this to -> server_send_read_response_prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := read_response_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}
server_send_safe_coh : forall (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d m -> coh d
server_send_safe_in : forall (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d m -> this \in nodes /\ to \in nodes
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
client_send_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), client_send_safe this to d m -> coh d
server_step : nat -> forall (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d msg -> option heapUMC
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
server_step_def : forall (the_tag : nat) (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d msg < -> (exists (b : heapUMC) (pf : server_send_safe prec this to d msg), server_step the_tag pf = Some b)
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
client_send_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), client_send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes /\ to \in nodes
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
rs_step = fun (the_tag : nat) (this from : nid) (m : seq nat) (d : dstatelet) (pf : coh d) => fun=> (if this == server then let s := getSt_server pf in st :-> server_recv_step s from the_tag m else getLocal this d) : nat -> receive_step_t coh Expanded type for implicit arguments rs_step : nat -> forall this : nid, nid -> seq nat -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> this \in (fun=> [eta nodes]) d -> heap Arguments rs_step _%nat_scope [this] _ _ [d]
client_send_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => [/\ HClient this n, coh d & prec n msg] : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments client_send_safe _ _ _ _%seq_scope
server_send_safe = fun (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop) (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => HServ this n /\ (exists C : coh d, prec (getSt_server C) n msg) : (server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop) -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments server_send_safe _%function_scope _ _ _ _%seq_scope
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
client_send_to_in : forall this to : nat_eqType, HClient this to -> to \in nodes

```coq
unfold s_step_coh_t. intros. unfold coh. unfold client_step. unfold client_send_safe. simpl. intuition.
